channel.title: [Delta] Stop Death On Login?
channel.description:
Hello again, This is a problem I've been trying to fix for quite some time now, but it doesn't go away. Whenever a new player logs in, they die. I know this is a common problem, so bear with me if I seem to be just another bad coder. Can someone help me solve this?
Thanks

item.title: [Delta] Stop Death On Login?
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

[quote=“Owner-X, post:3, topic:471043”]I have no applyDead / applyDeath in my client.java / player.java files.
Also, no “< 1” that would set a new player’s hp to 0.[/quote]

Which would make them dead…

Like I said, look for the login methods and find out what each line is actually doing.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Stop Death On Login?
item.dc:creator: @Owner-X Owner-X
item.description:
@Owner-X wrote:

I have no applyDead / applyDeath in my client.java / player.java files.
Also, no “< 1” that would set a new player’s hp to 0.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Stop Death On Login?
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

There is probably

applyDead();

when the player logs in, or something along those lines. Possibly settings their hp to < 1… Have a look around the login methods?

Read full topic
